thread.title: 5 Comic Actors Invested In This Year's Super Bowl
thread.title_full: 5 Comic Actors Invested In This Year's Super Bowl

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: 5 Comic Actors Invested In This Year's Super Bowl
text:
Start Slideshow Slide of 
This year's Super Bowl is just a week away, and the stars have been out in waves supporting the two competing teams. 
The Atlanta Falcons and New England Patriots will be squaring off in the big game next Sunday, and both teams have some big comic book actors who support them week in and week out. 
The New England Patriots fans are famous for having super-stars backing them on social media, and they've got a ton of representation in the comic community. 
The Falcons may not have as many, but their big named supporters come out in full force to back their birds. 
Take a look at five comic actors who have big stakes in this game, and you can expect them to be all over Twitter next Sunday.
